charges.charge_description: Ct. 1: False statements, (18 USC 1001); PENALTY: Cts. 1-2: 5 yrs. and/or $250, 000.00; $50 spec. assessment; not more than 3 yrs. term of supervised release ea. ct. (1)

Ct. 2: Transport monetary instruments of more than $10,000.00 into the U.S. from the Republic of Mexico; (31 USC 5316 (a)(1)(B) &; 5322); PENALTY: Cts. 1-2: 5 yrs. and/or $250,000.00; $50.00 special assessment ea. ct., not more than 3 yrs. term of supervised release ea. ct. INSTRUMENTS (2)

Knowingly were about to transport monetary instruments of more than $10,000, namely $110,481 in U.S. currency from International port of entry, Bridge II, Laredo to Mexico, without filing a Report of International Transportation of Currency or Monetary Instruments. [5:00-m-590]
Ct. 1: False statements, (18 USC 1001); PENALTY: Cts. 1-2: 5 yrs. and/or $250, 000.00; $50 spec. assessment; not more than 3 yrs. term of supervised release ea. ct. (1)

Ct. 2: Transport monetary instruments of more than $10,000.00 into the U.S. from the Republic of Mexico; (31 USC 5316 (a)(1)(B) &; 5322); PENALTY: Cts. 1-2: 5 yrs. and/or $250,000.00; $50.00 special assessment ea. ct., not more than 3 yrs. term of supervised release ea. ct. INSTRUMENTS (2)

Knowingly were about to transport monetary instruments of more than $10,000, namely $110,481 in U.S. currency from International port of entry, Bridge II, Laredo to Mexico, without filing a Report of International Transportation of Currency or Monetary Instruments. [5:00-m-590]
